titleStmt.title: The humble petition of His Majesties loyall subjects in the county of Lincoln.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill.,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at York by Robert Barker, :

notesStmt.note: Thanks the King for the present Parliament ... Regrets misunderstandings fostered ... by the Popish Party. Prays for reunion ... -- Steele.
Steele notation: Type headline Ma- enacted of.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
